meanings.definition: Provide with a quality or ability
meanings.sent1: She was endued with great patience.
meanings.sent2: The teacher endued her students with knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The cat was endued with the ability to speak in dreams.
meanings.sent4: His words were endued with a magical power that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The hero was endued with incredible strength to defeat the monster.

meanings.sent1: The king endued his son with a royal cloak.
meanings.sent2: She endued the statue with a beautiful shawl.
meanings.sent3: The tree was endued with a coat of shimmering leaves.
meanings.sent4: The artist endued the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The wizard endued the wand with powerful enchantments.

meanings.sent1: The fairy endued the child with a wish.
meanings.sent2: He endued his friend with a special gift.
meanings.sent3: The genie endued the lamp with magical abilities.
meanings.sent4: The scholarship endued her with the opportunity to study abroad.
meanings.sent5: The blessing endued the land with prosperity.
